description:
Give little rippers' hands a layer of protection for those inevitable spills. Ventilated palms and mesh between the fingers help keep hands cool, while grippy braking fingers keep the velocity under control.

  • Touchscreen compatible fingertips makes on-trail videos easy
  • Synthetic leather palms (made with recycled plastic bottles) have laser-cut ventilation
  • Quick-drying stretch material on the backs
  • Pre-curved design for comfort
  • Cuff-less design makes pulling on easy
name: Sombrio Grom's Epik Gloves - Youths
